quoteText:
Binding Arbitration and Waivers.

Any dispute, claim or controversy arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the breach, termination, enforcement, interpretation or validity thereof, including the determination of the scope or applicability of this agreement to arbitrate, shall be determined by arbitration in New York, New York before a single arbitrator.
title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
